title: Check Production Capacity for a Large Order
description: A customer wants to place a very large order, and the sales rep needs to check if there is enough production capacity to meet the requested delivery date.

tasks.description: Enter the product and quantity for the potential order.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent enters the details of the large order.
The system checks material availability and production capacity.

tasks.description: The system returns a confirmation that the order can be fulfilled by the requested date. The sales rep informs the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the delivery date with the customer.
